#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,u;
	u = 1;
	cin>>t;
	while(u<=t)
	{
		int n,a[101];
		cin>>n;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
			cin>>a[i];
		sort(a,a+n);
		cout<<"Case "<<u<<": ";
		cout<<a[n-1]+a[n-2]+a[n-3];
		cout<<endl;
		u++;
	}
	return 0;
}
